thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Digital Sports Editor - Sports Media

title: Digital Sports Editor - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. ™ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Digital Sports Editor Posted/Updated: 10-16-2015 Brief Job Description: Montanas largest newspaper and the states premier provider of sports content, has a opening for a savvy and creative digital/online sports editor to play a key role in growing statewide coverage.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
